p: Earlier CDC reports have indicated that 31% of cases, 45% of hospitalizations, 53% of ICU admissions, and 80% of deaths occurred among adults aged ≥65 years with the highest percentage of severe outcomes among persons aged ≥85 years. Severe illness leading to hospitalization, including ICU admission and death, can occur in adults of any age with COVID-19. However, individuals aged <19 appear to have milder COVID-19 illness [ 9].
